description: Russia's revised basic law would define marriage as a heterosexual union and include faith in God.
title: Russia's Putin wants traditional marriage and God in constitution
title_page: Russia's Putin wants traditional marriage and God in constitution - BBC News
maintext: But since Mr Putin has decided he wants Russians to vote on the proposals, he needs to find a way of getting people excited about the changes - and getting them to the ballot boxes on 22 April. That's where the populist slogans come in - and subjects like God, family and marriage - as well as promises to include in the constitution support for wages and pensions.
